attributes.action: NATIONALLY RECOGNISE REGINALD .J. MITCHELL ON BANKNOTES AND STATUE
attributes.additional_details:
IN REMEMBERANCE OF THE HUGE DEBT THAT AS A NATION WE OWE TO REGINALD .J. MITCHELL, THE AEROPLANE DESIGNER AND ENGINEER. MITCHELL IS THE GENIUS BEHIND THE SUPERMARINE SPITFIRE AIRCRAFT OF WW2 FAME. AN AEROPLANE WHICH HELPED TO TURN THE TIDE OF WW2, IN OUR COUNTRY'S FAVOUR AND GUARANTEED FUTURE GENERATIONS FREEDOM. AS SUCH, A STATUE IN WHITEHALL OF MITCHELL IS MOST BEFITTING AND WELL OVERDUE. ALSO WE SHOULD PUT THIS HERO ON OUR BANKNOTES, PERHAPS THE £20 NOTE OR £10 NOTE.
IN DOING THE ABOVE, WE WILL BOTH EDUCATE THE YOUNG ON THIS PART OF OUR COUNTRY'S HISTORY WHILST CELEBRATING REGINALD .J. MITCHELL VITAL CONTRIBUTION TO OUR NATION'S HERITAGE AND REPAY IN PART OUR COLLECTIVE DEBT TO THIS UNIQUE HISTORICAL PERSON.
